title: Forward
description: Librarian note: older cover of B01B41YKQI.Lara finally has everything going for her. Perfect job, great apartment and a boyfriend who loves her. That is, until one night when her past and present collide. The man who she thought she'd love forever vanished without a trace seven years ago. Suddenly he has returned and is making waves in Lara's life. Her new boyfriend Tom, is perfect. Smart, sexy and loving with a British accent Lara can't help but love. When Tom asks her for a future in another country, Lara finds she desperately wants it, despite the obstacles that come with that future. Now Lara has to decide who she wants to move forward with. The man of her past or the man of her present.
author: J. Saman
